named-query.name: Curso.listarCursoDocente
named-query.query: Select c FROM Curso c where c.docente.id=?1

named-query.name: SesionCurso.TiempoSemestre
named-query.query: select sum(s.horaFinal-s.horaInicial)/10000 from SesionCurso s INNER JOIN s.curso c on c.codigo=s.curso where c.docente.id=?1 and c.asignatura IN (select a from Asignatura a where a.id=?2) and s IN (select r.sesion from Registro r where r.sesion.id=s.id) and s.curso.semestre.anho=?3 and s.curso.semestre.periodo=?4

named-query.name: SesionCurso.TiempoMes
named-query.query: select sum(s.horaFinal-s.horaInicial)/10000 from SesionCurso s INNER JOIN s.curso c on c.codigo=s.curso where month(s.curso.semestre.fechaInicio) = ?1 and c.docente.id=?2 and c.asignatura IN (select a from Asignatura a where a.id=?3) and s IN (select r.sesion from Registro r where r.sesion.id=s.id) and s.curso.semestre.anho=?4 and s.curso.semestre.periodo=?5

named-query.name: Registro.listarAprobados
named-query.query: select count(r) from Registro r INNER JOIN r.sesion s on s.id=r.sesion INNER JOIN s.curso c on c.codigo=s.curso where r.aprobadoCoord=1 and r.aprobadoRH=1 and c.asignatura IN (select a from Asignatura a where a.id=?1) and c.docente in (select d from Docente d where d.id=?2) and c.semestre.anho=?3 and c.semestre.periodo=?4

named-query.name: Registro.listarTodos
named-query.query: select count(r) from Registro r INNER JOIN r.sesion s on s.id=r.sesion INNER JOIN s.curso c on c.codigo=s.curso where c.asignatura IN (select a from Asignatura a where a.id=?1) and c.docente in (select d from Docente d where d.id=?2) and c.semestre.anho=?3 and c.semestre.periodo=?4

named-query.name: SesionCurso.listarSesionesCurso
named-query.query: SELECT se FROM SesionCurso se WHERE se.curso.codigo=?1

named-query.name: Programa.listarTodos
